Plot: Set in Baroque France, a scheming widow and her lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman. The lover, Valmont, bets that he can seduce her, even though she is an...
Title: Valmont
Writer: Choderlos de Laclos (novel), Jean-Claude Carrière, Milos Forman
Actors: Colin Firth, Annette Bening, Meg Tilly, Fairuza Balk
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
